attributes.action: Recommend The chairman of the BNP,Nick Griffin, for a Knighthood .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nick has suffered countless indignities to give a voice to the concerns of millions of decent British people who despair at the way the country has been destroyed .

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
